CVE.summary: The poll_mode_io file for the megaraid_sas driver in the Linux kernel 2.6.31.6 and earlier has world-writable permissions, which allows local users to change the I/O mode of the driver by modifying this file.

IAVM.title: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Red Hat Linux Kernel

vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN

Oval.title: DSA-1996 linux-2.6 -- privilege escalation/denial of service/sensitive memory leak
RHSA-2010:0046: kernel security and bug fix update (Important)
DSA-1996-1 linux-2.6 -- privilege escalation/denial of service/sensitive memory leak

The poll_mode_io file for the megaraid_sas driver in the Linux kernel 2.6.31.6 and earlier has world-writable permissions, which allows local users to change the I/O mode of the driver by modifying this file.
